Peace Lily, is a very popular indoor houseplant. It is a clump-growing herbaceous perennial which produces white flowers which look like the hood of a cobra.
Gardenia is a genus of flowering plants in the coffee family. Gardenia is an attractive, waxy, creamy-white flowers bearing.
The anthurium red plant has a bright pink, a tube-shaped flower that sits on the end of a long stalk. The plant is often called the flamingo flower for its resemblance to the bird.

The unique colour combination of the flowers makes this variety very attractive.Anthurium andraeanum is one of the plants listed in the�NASA Clean Air Study�as effective in removing�formaldehyde,�xylene,�toluene, and�ammonia�from the air.

Saintpaulias, commonly known as African violets, are a genus of 6-20 species of herbaceous perennial flowering plants in the family Gesneriaceae, native to Tanzania and adjacent southeastern Kenya in eastern tropical Africa. Typically the African violet is a common household indoor plant but can also be an outdoor plant. Several of the species and subspecies are endangered, and many more are threatened, due to their native cloud forest habitats being cleared for agriculture.
Sinningia speciosa, a popular houseplant, was originally described and introduced to cultivation as Gloxinia speciosa and is still commonly known as "gloxinia".
The Brazilian Plume Flower is a shade loving, tropical evergreen perennial shrub with large deep green leaves.
Lunaria annua, called honesty or annual honesty in English, is a species of flowering plant native to the Balkans and south west Asia, and naturalized throughout the temperate world.
Roses are a group of herbaceous shrubs found in temperate regions throughout both hemispheres. Rose is considered by many as the most beautiful of all flowers.
Bougainvillea is a genus of thorny ornamental vines, bushes, and trees with flower-like spring leaves near its flowers.
Blooms profusely with 1 yellow-orange flowers, which are borne singly on the end of each stem. Plant creeps and roots at nodes, making a dense ground cover.
Mogra is widely cultivated for its attractive and sweetly fragrant flowers. The flowers are also used for perfumes and for making tea.
Thunbergia erecta is a herbaceous perennial climbing plant species in the genus Thunbergia native to western Africa.
Cuphea Hyssopifolia is a small evergreen shrub.This plant has gained the Royal Horticultural Society Award of Garden Merit.
Marigold are among the very popular flowers commonly found in India and other countries.

Embellish the garden-themed beauty of your backyard and surrounding decor with orange flowers from our expansive collection. These outdoor silk flowers are handcrafted to be gorgeous and natural - they appear to flourish directly from the soil of your terra-cotta flowering pot. You can also settle these orange flowers into the mulch of your flower bed without worries over bug infestations or rotting. Their leaves and blossoms are coated with a protective sheen that combats the usual wear-and-tear of constant weather exposure. Additionally, our outdoor silk flowers are designed to be long-lasting for enjoyment, elegance, and overall loveliness throughout every year.

A traditional symbol of the holiday season for nearly 200 years, the poinsettia was discovered in Mexico by Joel Roberts Poinsett who was the US Ambassador at the time. Poinsett noticed the poinsettia by the side of a road in Southern Mexico. Fascinated by the leaves, Poinsett brought it back to his greenhouse in South Carolina. The Poinsettia quickly spread in popularity at Christmas time for its vibrant red flowers and dark green leaves. Hooks and Lattice has a special polyblend style poinsettia that is rated for outdoor use, and has five large blooms on them. These poinsettias will look great time and again, and are UV protected to ensure many merry Christmases in the future. Stands 18" in height, and comes UNPOTTED. Place in a planter, hanging basket, or window box for a festive non-fading display, even if you want to leave them up until Easter.
